param.name: portrait_help
param.label: Display description
param.default: To display "[edit photo]", type following into description: [menu style="color:green;" caption="&91;edit your photo&93;" img=""] _UE_MENU_EDIT : _UE_UPDATEAVATAR [/menu]

param.name: title
param.label: User Profile Title text
param.description: Page title text. Enter text to be displayed as profile page title. %s will be replaced by user-name depending on global settings. Or use language-dependant _UE_PROFILE_TITLE_TEXT (default)

param.name: field_display_style
param.label: Display on profiles as
param.description: How to display the values of this multi-valued field

param.name: field_display_class
param.label: CSS class of the list
param.description: Enter the name of the list class (optional) for OL or UL tag

param.name: integer_minimum
param.label: Minimum value allowed
param.description: Enter the minimum integer value allowed. Default is 0.

param.name: integer_maximum
param.label: Maximum value allowed
param.description: Enter the maximum value allowed. Default is 1000000.

param.name: fieldValidateForbiddenList_register
param.label: Forbidden values at registration
param.description: You can set a list of values (separated by comma ,) which are not allowed in this field for registration.

param.name: fieldValidateForbiddenList_profile
param.label: Forbidden values in user profile edits
param.description: You can set a list of values (separated by comma ,) which are not allowed in this field when user updates his profile in profile edits.

param.name: fieldValidateExpression
param.label: Authorized input
param.description: Type of input authorized.

param.name: pregexp
param.label: Perl Regular Expression
param.description: Any string: /^.*$/ , only digits: /^[0-9]*$/, only a-z + A-Z + digits: /^[0-9a-z]*$/i

param.name: pregexperror
param.label: Error in case of invalid input
param.description: Enter a clear and helpful error message in case of validation pattern mismatch.

param.name: year_min
param.label: Minimum Year shown
param.description: Type +0 for this year, type-in 4-digits year, for example 1923, or just a number prefixed with + or - sign, for example +25 or -110, to set a value relative to current year, e.g. -99 for maximum age of 99 years (or 190

param.name: year_max
param.label: Maximum Year shown
param.description: Type +0 for this year, type-in 4-digits year, for example 1923, or just a number prefixed with + or - sign, for example +25 or -110, to set a value relative to current year, e.g. -12 for minimum age of 12 years

param.name: field_display_by
param.label: Display on profiles as
param.description: Whether you want users to see this date on profile as a date or as an age

param.name: field_display_years_text
param.label: Display N years text
param.description: Whether you want to display just number N of years (e.g. Age: 20), or add ' years' behind the age N (e.g. Age: 20 years). Uses language-string _UE_AGE_YEARS.

param.name: field_display_ago_text
param.label: Display T ago text
param.description: Whether you want to display just the time T ago (e.g. 3 months), or add ' ago' behind the time T (e.g. 3 months ago). Uses language-string _UE_ANYTHING_AGO.

param.name: field_search_by
param.label: If searchable, then search by
param.description: Whether you want users to search by date or by age

param.name: duration_title
param.label: Alternate field title for age/time ago/birthday only display
param.description: Leave blank for using same title as in normal date display mode, or enter alternate text, e.g. 'Age' (multilinguale: type just: _UE_AGE) or 'Birthday' (_UE_Birthday) instead of normal birthdate title. CB translation strings, as well as fields-substitutions, e.g. '[name]'s age' can be used.

param.name: show_date_time
param.label: Display Date and time
param.description: Whether you want to display date and time
param.option: Yes date and also time if available

param.name: year_min
param.label: Minimum Year shown
param.description: Type +0 for this year, type-in 4-digits year, for example 1923, or just a number prefixed with + or - sign, for example +25 or -110, to set a value relative to current year, e.g. -99 for maximum age of 99 years (or 190

param.name: year_max
param.label: Maximum Year shown
param.description: Type +0 for this year, type-in 4-digits year, for example 1923, or just a number prefixed with + or - sign, for example +25 or -110, to set a value relative to current year, e.g. -12 for minimum age of 12 years

param.label: Display on profiles as
param.description: Whether you want users to see this date on profile as a date or as an age

param.label: Display N years text
param.description: Whether you want to display just number N of years (e.g. Age: 20), or add ' years' behind the age N (e.g. Age: 20 years). Uses language-string _UE_AGE_YEARS.

param.name: field_display_ago_text
param.label: Display T ago text
param.description: Whether you want to display just the time T ago (e.g. 3 months), or add ' ago' behind the time T (e.g. 3 months ago). Uses language-string _UE_ANYTHING_AGO.

param.name: field_search_by
param.label: If searchable, then search by
param.description: Whether you want users to search by date or by age

param.name: duration_title
param.label: Alternate field title for age/time ago/birthday only display
param.description: Leave blank for using same title as in normal date display mode, or enter alternate text, e.g. 'Age' (multilinguale: type just: _UE_AGE) or 'Birthday' (_UE_Birthday) instead of normal birthdate title. CB translation strings, as well as fields-substitutions, e.g. '[name]'s age' can be used.

param.label: Display Date and time
param.description: Whether you want to display date and time

param.name: field_display_style
param.label: Display on profiles as
param.description: How to display the values of this multi-valued field

param.name: field_display_class
param.label: CSS class of the list
param.description: Enter the name of the list class (optional) for OL or UL tag

param.name: field_check_email
param.label: Enable Email checker
param.description: Whether you want to feedback to user if email is valid or not.
param.option: Yes: Check email address and server

param.name: fieldValidateExpression
param.label: Authorized input
param.description: Type of input authorized.

param.name: pregexp
param.label: Perl Regular Expression
param.description: Any string: /^.*$/ , only digits: /^[0-9]*$/, only a-z + A-Z + digits: /^[0-9a-z]*$/i

param.name: pregexperror
param.label: Error in case of invalid input
param.description: Enter a clear and helpful error message in case of validation pattern mismatch.

param.name: fieldValidateForbiddenList_register
param.label: Forbidden words at registration
param.description: You can set a list of bad words (separated by comma ,) which are not allowed in this field for registration. Use comma twice (,,) to add comma as bad character.

param.name: fieldValidateForbiddenList_profile
param.label: Forbidden words in user profile edits
param.description: You can set a list of bad words (separated by comma ,) which are not allowed in this field when user updates his profile in profile edits. Use comma twice (,,) to add comma as bad character.

fieldset.label: Image limits
fieldset.description: If left empty, the default settings from global Community Builder configuration will be taken. Other settings, like images-library, systematic resampling and so on is done in the CB global configuration.

param.name: avatarHeight
param.label: _UE_AVHEIGHT
param.description: TMaximum height in pixels to which the image on the profile will be resized

param.name: avatarWidth
param.label: _UE_AVWIDTH
param.description: Maximum width in pixels to which the image on the profile will be resized

param.name: avatarSize
param.label: _UE_AVSIZE
param.description: Maximum size of file upload in kilobytes: recommended: 4000 for modern cameras (if your server supports that)

param.name: thumbHeight
param.label: _UE_TNHEIGHT
param.description: Maximum height in pixels to which the image on a users-list be resized

param.name: thumbWidth
param.label: _UE_TNWIDTH
param.description: Maximum width in pixels to which the image on a users-list be resized

param.name: avatarModerationWarning
param.label: WARNING
param.default: Only the main avatar is moderated for now, other image field types are not moderated in this release.
